section.p: The Medications Section contains information about the relevant medications for the patient. At a minimum, the currently active medications should be listed.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Medications Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.19) (C83-[CT-112-1])

SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.8) (C83-[CT-112-2])
SHALL conform to CCD Medications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.8)
SHALL conform to IHE Medications Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.19)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC) (CONF-300, CONF-301)

[CCD] Contains [0..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

[CCD] Contains [0..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.34)

[HITSP] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.8) (C83-[CT-112-2])
[CCD] SHALL satisfy: The absence of known medications is explicitly asserted. (CONF-299)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Valued with a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'medication'. (CONF-303)

[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Clinical statements include one or more Medication Activity and/or one or more Supply Activity. (CONF-298)
[OCL]: self.getSubstanceAdministrations()->exists(activity : cda::SubstanceAdministration | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::MedicationActivity)) or self.getSupplies()->exists(activity : cda::Supply | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::SupplyActivity))
